message.body: I'm on antibiotics right now because infound a tick on my taint after camping all last weekend
I'm either gonna die or go crazy

Sucks man. I've been presumably really lucky considering how much time I spend in the woods. I use a fair amount of feet though. Try some knot weed or black walnut if you still feel ill after the antibiotics
Where are you hunting for mushrooms? I dont think theres much lyme carriers in pA
All my friends got Lyme pretty much so there plenty here. I hunt mostly in fairmount park, cobs creek and wissahickon
Dang. Its pretty treatable if you catch it early. I didnt have the rash so i think i'm ok
Its even treatable later. Why dont your friends go to the rx?
